name: Wereboar
armor_desc: n humanoid form, 11 (natural armor) in boar or hybrid for
damage_resistances: bludgeoning,piercing,and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks

actions.name: Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: The wereboar makes three Maul or Slam attacks. It can replace one attack with a Tusks attack, provided it is in the appropriate form. If two Maul or Slam attacks hit one creature, the target must succeed on a DC 13 STR save or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Maul (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 10 (2d6+3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Slam (Boar or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 10 (2d6+3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Tusks (Boar or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 10 (2d6+3) slashing damage. If the target is a Humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 12 CON save or be cursed with the wereboar lycanthropy curse (see Curse of Lycanthropy sidebar).

special_abilities.name: Charge (Boar or Hybrid Form Only)
special_abilities.desc: If the wereboar moves at least 15 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a Slam or Tusks attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) damage of the weapon's type. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 STR save or be knocked prone.

special_abilities.name: Relentless (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
special_abilities.desc: If the wereboar takes 14 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 HP, it is reduced to 1 HP instead.
